Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Annunciation:

Text.Language: Aviwt joust e~bol qen t~ve: e~jen n/etsop hijen pikahi: m~pefjem v/eto~ni m~moc: m~Maria ]paryenoc.
The Father looked down from heaven, to those who dwell on earth, He found no one like, Mary the virgin.
تطلع الآب من السماء على سكان الأرض فلم يجد من يُشبه مريم العذراء.
Afouwrp saroc n~Gabri/l: pinis] n~ar,/aggeloc: afhisennoufi nac n~ourasi: m~pair/] efjw m~moc.
He sent to her Gabriel, the great archangel, he announced to her, with joy saying.
أرسل إليها غبريال رئيس الملائكة العظيم فبشرها بفرح قائلا هكذا.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ouoh Po#c# sop neme: a~rejimi gar n~ouh~mot: qaten V] Viwt.
"Hail to you O full of grace, the Lord is with you, you have found grace, before God the Father."
السلام للممتلئة نعمة الرب معك وجدت نعمة عند الله الآب.
H/ppe gar teraerboki: ouoh n~temici n~ous/ri: euemou] e~pefran je I/#c#: Ps/ri m~v/et[oci.
"Behold you will conceive, and give birth to a son, He will be called Jesus, the Son of the Most High."
لأنك ها تحبلين وتلدين ابناً ويدعى اسمه يسوع إبن العلى.
Efe~] naf n~je Po#c# V]: m~piy~ronoc n~te Dauid pefiwt: f~nae~rouro e~jen p~/i n~Iakwb: sa e~neh n~te pie~neh.
"The Lord God will give Him, the throne of His father David, and He will reign over the house of Jacob, forever and ever."
ويعطيه الرب الاله كرسى داود أبيه ويملك على بيت يعقوب إلى أبد الأبد.
Ouoh n~ne qae~: swpi n~te tefmetouro: ouoh menenca y~remacf: e~reo~hi e~reoi m~paryenoc.
"And also His kingdom, will have no end, and after you will give birth to Him, you will remain a virgin."
ولايكون لملكه نهاية وبعد ان تلديه تظلين عذراء.
Peje Maria ]paryenoc: je a~nok ic ]bwki n~te Po#c#: ece~swpi kata pekcaji: afsenaf e~bol n~je piaggeloc.
The Virgin Mary answered, "I am the handmaiden of the Lord, be it to me according to your word", and the angel departed.
فأجابت مريم العذراء هوذا أنا أمة الرب ليكن لى كقولك فمضى الملاك.
Tenouwst m~mok w~ P,#c#: v/etakmai m~pengenoc: aki~ e~y~m/tra n~]paryenoc: ak[icarx e~bol n~q/tc.
We worship You O Christ, for You have loved our race, and came to the womb of the Virgin, and was incarnate from her.
نسجد لك أيها المسيح لأنك أحببت جنسنا وأتيت إلى بطن العذراء وتجسدت منها.
Tenhwc e~rok ten]w~ou nak: tenerhouo~ [ici m~mok: hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai.
We praise and glorify You, and exalt You above all, as the Good One and Lover of Mankind, have mercy upon us according to Your great mercy.
نسبحك ونمجدك ونزيدك رفعة كصالح ومحب البشر إرحمنا كعظيم رحمتك.
All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~v~nou] af[icarx qen ]paryenoc.
Alleluia (4), Jesus Christ the Son of God, was incarnate of the Virgin.
هلليلويا (4)، يسوع المسيح إبن الله، تجسد من العذراء.
